facilities¶

Created on Tue May 28 11:32:33 2019

@author: yoelr

class biosteam.units.facilities.Facility(ID='', ins=None, outs=())[source]¶
class biosteam.units.facilities.ProcessWaterCenter(ID='', ins=None, outs=(), *, BT, CT)[source]¶

ins

[0] Recycle water

[1] Make-up water

[2] Boiler water

[3] Cooling tower water

outs

[0] Process water

[1] Boiler water

[2] Cooling tower water

class biosteam.units.facilities.ChilledWaterPackage(ID='')[source]¶

Create a chilled water package that is cost based on flow rate of chilled water.

Parameters

ID: [str] Unique identification. If set as ‘’, a default ID will be chosen.

outs: tuple[str or Stream] Output streams or IDs to initialize output streams. If None, leave streams missing. If empty, default IDs will be given.

ins: tuple[str or Stream] Input streams or IDs to initialize input streams. If None, leave streams missing. If empty, default IDs will be given.

Duty: Chilled water duty (kJ/hr)

class biosteam.units.facilities.BoilerTurbogenerator(ID='', ins=None, outs=(), *, boiler_efficiency=0.8, turbogenerator_efficiency=0.85)[source]¶

Create a Boiler_TurboGenerator object that will calculate electricity generation from burning the feed. It also takes into account how much steam is being produced, and the required cooling utility of the turbo generator. No emissions or mass balances are taken into account.

Parameters

ID: [str] Unique identification. If set as ‘’, a default ID will be chosen.

outs: tuple[str or Stream] Output streams or IDs to initialize output streams. If None, leave streams missing. If empty, default IDs will be given.

ins: tuple[str or Stream] Input streams or IDs to initialize input streams. If None, leave streams missing. If empty, default IDs will be given.

boiler_efficiency: [float] Fraction of heat transfered to steam.

turbo_generator_efficiency: [float] Fraction of steam heat converted to electricity.

ins

[0] Feed that will be burned.

outs

[0] Emission (burned feed)
class biosteam.units.facilities.CoolingTower(ID='')[source]¶

Create a cooling tower that is cost based on flow rate of cooling water.

class biosteam.units.facilities.AirDistributionPackage(ID='', ins=None, outs=())[source]¶
